# \<ppw-pubkey\>

Show any key in hexadecimal or base 64.
A button puts the key in the clipboard.

## node prop

With the inline MDC syntax :

:::code-group
  :::code-block{label="Preview"}

    ::ppw-checklist-view-pubkey{node=""}

  :::
  
  ```markdown [Code]
    ::ppw-checklist-view-pubkey{node=""}
  ```
:::


With the extended MDC syntax :

:::code-group
  :::code-block{label="Preview"}

    ::ppw-checklist-view-pubkey
    ---
    node: |
        
    ---
    ::

  :::
  
  ```markdown [Code]
    ::ppw-checklist-view-pubkey
    ---
    node: |
        
    ---
    ::
  ```
:::

## Not implemented

* support slot content
* set format
* enable/disable format selection
* enable/disable copy button
* show/hide card class
